Sk. Tanvir Hossain

Currently I am enrolled as a doctoral student at the Business and Economics Department at the Technical University of Dortmund (TU Dortmund), Germany and working on my dissertation. I have been also an adjunct lecturer at the Economics Department of East West University, Bangladesh. From 2018 - 2022, as a doctoral student, I was also a research associate (in German Wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter) at the Department of Statistics at TU Dortmund (alumni page), and I gratefully acknowledge all their support and guidance.

I completed M.Sc. in Economics from the University of Mannheim, Germany, and Bachelors in Business with a second major in Economics from BRAC University, Bangladesh. My research interests lie at the intersection of Causal Inference, Econometrics, and Machine Learning (both theoretical and applied works).

Throughtout my academic career I have been blessed to have many amazing teachers and mentors without whom I would not have reached where I am today. Their guidance, wisdom, and encouragement have been instrumental in my life. In particular I always feel indebted to Professor Carsten Jentsch, for his belief in my potential which pushed me to continue striving for excellence since my masters, Professor Wasiqur Rahman Khan, for his continuous support since my bachelors, Professor M. Ataharul Islam (late), for his belief that I can learn Statistics (he is the one who exposed me to the beauty of Statistics), and Professor A.M. Tanvir Hussain, for his amazing support which was always there when I needed it most, must say - his door was always open for his students.

I am also grateful to my family and friends who have always been there for me. I enjoy coding and I love to learn new things. You can find my CV in pdf here, more about what courses I taught as well as some course materials in the in the teaching page, papers I am currently working in the research page and some additional details in the more-details page.


Thanks for dropping by, to contact please send me an email @ tanvir.hossain@tu-dortmund.de
